page.title: 01Gazetteer PT
page.content:
This area is mainly to the south of the{River Tees}on the boundary of{ {County Durham}and{North Yorkshire, near the towns of Darlington, Richmond and Barnard Castle.
It is mostly{farmland}and includes 16 farms with parts of several others. {Arable}land covers two-thirds of the area. The rest is grassland with small areas of wood.
The two{villages}are Eppleby (230 inhabitants) and Caldwell (106) { {Eppleby,}built round a green, has a school, village hall, post office, shop, riding centre, craft centre, blacksmith, police house and 2 pubs. {Caldwell}is mainly residential but has a church, a pub and a medieval dovecote.
